name: Jellyfin Xtream (Flat View)

versions.changelog:
Added graphical progress indicator for cache refresh:

✨ **New Features:**
- Progress bar and status display in Series configuration page
- Scheduled task 'Refresh Xtream Series Cache' in Dashboard → Scheduled Tasks
- Real-time progress updates (every 2 seconds)
- API endpoint /Xtream/SeriesCacheStatus for programmatic access

📊 **Progress Display:**
- Shows percentage complete (0-100%)
- Current status message with detailed counts
- Color-coded status (blue = in progress, green = complete)
- Start and completion timestamps

🎯 **Usage:**
- View progress in Plugins → Series configuration page
- Or in Dashboard → Scheduled Tasks → 'Refresh Xtream Series Cache'
- Task can be triggered manually or scheduled
Added detailed progress logging for cache refresh. See real-time progress in Jellyfin logs showing categories, series, seasons, and episodes being cached.

**NEW: Pre-fetch and cache all series data upfront - No more lazy loading delays!**

**Features:**
- All series, seasons, and episodes are now cached when plugin loads or configuration changes
- Navigation is instant - data loads from cache instead of making API calls on every page visit
- Cache automatically refreshes when plugin configuration changes
- **Configurable cache expiration time** (default: 60 minutes / 1 hour)
- Users can adjust cache expiration in Series configuration page (1-1440 minutes)
- Lower values = fresher data but more API calls
- Higher values = fewer calls but potentially stale data

**Fixes:**
- Missing episodes in some series - Added fallback to search all episodes by Season property when dictionary lookup fails
- This handles cases where episodes might be stored under different season ID keys in the API response

**Technical:**
- New SeriesCacheService handles all caching logic
- Cache runs in background on plugin initialization (doesn't block startup)
- Falls back to API calls if cache is unavailable
- Cache expires based on configured time or refreshes on config change

FIXED: Missing episodes in some series - Added fallback to search all episodes by Season property when dictionary lookup fails. This handles cases where episodes might be stored under different season ID keys in the API response.

## What's Changed

### Bug Fixes
- **Fix tag parsing for Unicode pipe characters** - IPTV providers often use Unicode box-drawing characters (┃, │, ｜) instead of ASCII pipe (|) for country tags like `┃NL┃`. The `ParseName` function now correctly strips these tags from series and movie titles.

### Supported tag formats
- `[TAG]` - Square brackets
- `|TAG|` - ASCII pipe
- `┃TAG┃` - Box drawing heavy vertical (U+2503)
- `│TAG│` - Box drawing light vertical (U+2502)
- `｜TAG｜` - Fullwidth vertical line (U+FF5C)
- Spaces inside pipes: `| TAG |`, `┃ TAG ┃`

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rolandb5/Jellyfin.Xtream/compare/v0.9.1.3...v0.9.1.4
Added explicit check for non-empty episodes collection. This ensures episodes are only returned when they actually exist.
Simplified GetEpisodes to use TryGetValue pattern correctly. This should fix episodes not appearing when clicking on seasons.
Fixed missing episodes in series view by adding configuration check and safe season lookup in GetEpisodes method.

## New Features: Flat Series & VOD View

This release adds the ability to display all series and movies directly without category folders.

### Features
- ✅ Flat series view option in configuration
- ✅ Flat VOD view option in configuration
- ✅ Shows all series/movies directly from selected categories
- ✅ Maintains hierarchy (seasons/episodes for series)
- ✅ Backward compatible (opt-in features)

### How to Use
1. Install the plugin from the repository
2. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Series tab
   - Enable "Flatten Series View" checkbox
3. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Video On-Demand tab
   - Enable "Flatten VOD View" checkbox
4. Save and refresh your library

### Changes
- Added FlattenSeriesView configuration property
- Added FlattenVodView configuration property
- Modified SeriesChannel to support flat view
- Modified VodChannel to support flat view
- Updated UI with checkboxes for both features
- Version bumped to 0.9.1.0

## New Feature: Flat Series View

This release adds the ability to display all series directly without category folders.

### Features
- ✅ Flat series view option in configuration
- ✅ Shows all series directly from selected categories
- ✅ Maintains season/episode hierarchy
- ✅ Backward compatible (opt-in feature)

### How to Use
1. Install the plugin from the repository
2. Go to Plugins → Xtream → Series tab
3. Enable "Flatten Series View" checkbox
4. Save and refresh your library

### Changes
- Added FlattenSeriesView configuration property
- Modified SeriesChannel to support flat view
- Updated UI with checkbox control
- Version bumped to 0.9.0.0
